scripts.build_development: yarn eslint:check && yarn ts:check && ./node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config ./{{ project_name }}/webpack/webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build_production: yarn eslint:check && yarn ts:check && ./node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config ./{{ project_name }}/webpack/webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build_test: yarn eslint:check && yarn ts:check && ./node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_PATH=./node_modules NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config ./{{ project_name }}/webpack/webpack.config.dev.js --env test=true
